rows.label: tlk46400076_07_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm very sorry, but only guests
with special permission are
permitted to stay here.

rows.label: tlk46400076_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Might I suggest you stay at the inn
in Goth Isut Port instead?

rows.label: tlk46400076_07_msg0004
rows.name:
I look forward to the day when I can
welcome you here once more.
Blessings be with you.
